caption:
As the Spring Equinox approaches, it’s the perfect time to set up your altar with intention, aligning your energy with the season of renewal, balance, and growth. This sacred space serves as a reflection of the shift in nature; where day and night stand in perfect harmony, reminding us to embrace new beginnings and fresh opportunities.

Incorporate elements that symbolize Air, Fire, Water, Earth & Spirit. You’re setting intentions, meditating, or performing a ritual, your altar becomes a powerful focal point for manifesting change.

Please take the altar suggestions if they resonate and align, and prepare yourself to welcome in the Spring Equinox this week. ✨

How are you preparing to welcome this new season of light and transformation?

#springequinox #springritual #altar #ceremony #springtime #seasonalliving #rituals
